newsitem.title: USA: Computer Language buys eviction-database co.
newsitem.headline: Computer Language buys eviction-database co.

text.p: Computer Language Research Inc said Thursday it has acquired substantially all of the assets of Automated Research Technology Inc, a move the company said would have a positive effect on its 1997 earnings.
The transaction was completed by Computer Language's wholly owned subsidiary, Rent Roll Inc, which sells residential property management software and services.
Automated Research markets eviction-database services to apartment communities.
Computer Language said the acquisition will have no material effect on this year's earnings, but is expected to have a positive effect in 1997 and in future years.
